segments.text: Hi , I was wondering if I could get my test results from the other day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I would like to schedule an appointment for you to come in and talk with me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , sometimes the test results aren â€™ t clear and we need to do more to get a clearer picture .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can we talk about it now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would if I knew anything for sure , but I want to take a second look .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: When can I come and see you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can come in this afternoon . If you would feel better , bring your husband with you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now I know that something bad is up !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just relax . We will talk about it this afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2
